thread.title: Jerry Sandusky’s Son Charged With Child Sex Abuse
thread.title_full: Jerry Sandusky’s Son Charged With Child Sex Abuse - WSJ

author: Kris Maher
title: Jerry Sandusky’s Son Charged With Child Sex Abuse
text:
Pennsylvania state police arrested the 41-year-old son of former Pennsylvania State University coach Jerry Sandusky on Monday and charged him with child sex abuse related to two minors, including the child of a woman he had been dating.

Jeffrey Sandusky was arraigned in Bellefonte, Pa., the same city in Centre County where his father was convicted in 2012 of abusing 10 boys over more than a decade. The elder Mr. Sandusky, who is 73,...
